name: BNNS.FullyConnectedLayer
desc: A layer object that wraps a fully connected filter and manages its deinitialization.

items.name: init?(input: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, output: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, weights: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, bias: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor?, activation: BNNS.ActivationFunction, filterParameters: BNNSFilterParameters?)
items.desc: Returns a new fully connected layer.
